name: Audio Player
description: Audio Player is a component for playing a variety of audio URLs.

properties.name: audioUrl
properties.label: Audio Url
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the url of the audio. Value returned by the handler will be used as the audio url.

properties.name: audioTitle
properties.label: Audio Title
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the title of the audio. Value returned by the handler will be used as the audio title.

properties.name: audioData
properties.label: Audio Data
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine an array of objects for Multiple Audio Player. Each object should include 'url' and 'title' of the track. Array returned by the handler will be used as the playlist for Multiple Audio Player.
